The folder contains a single player game, the test data is in sub folders named after the year.

We can ignore the backup subfolder.

In the subfolders we will have:

  - game files (.m1, .r1, .h1, .xy)
  - dump file for fleet summary: Game.fle
  - dump file for planet summary: Game.pla
  - screenshots to corroborate data:
      - scores.png
      - fleets.png
      - planets.png

The dump files are tab separated values with a header.
